New Records: Germany recorded their biggest-ever European Championship win with a 5-1 victory over Scotland
Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored in the 10th minute
Jamal Musiala scored in the 19th minute
Niclas Füllkrug scored in the 68th minute
Ryan Porteous was sent off in the 45th minute
Antonio Rüdiger scored an own goal in the 87th minute
Pre-Game Insights: No pre-game insights were mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections were mentioned in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Allianz Arena in Munich, Germany, in front of a crowd of 65,052 spectators
The match was refereed by Clément Turpin
